body_html: @iantheconway I only ever build using MSBuild from the Command Prompt, like in the instructions. If you're using Visual Studio, it ought to work, but there may be some configuration mismatch. In particular, the build is pretty massive, and Visual Studio's UI doesn't always make it easy to find the root cause of a build failure. It'd be great if you could capture the complete build output when building from a clean repository, as that will probably contain the information we need to fix it.

body: @iantheconway I only ever build using MSBuild from the Command Prompt, like in the instructions. If you're using Visual Studio, it ought to work, but there may be some configuration mismatch. In particular, the build is pretty massive, and Visual Studio's UI doesn't always make it easy to find the root cause of a build failure. It'd be great if you could capture the complete build output when building from a clean repository, as that will probably contain the information we need to fix it.
